site.summary: Muslims' most common misconceptions about christianity
site.name: Common Misunderstanding
site.description: The most misconceptions that Muslim have about Christianity, Christian lifestyle, and Holy Book

footer.footercenter: The history of Islam and Christianity is hardly an amiable one. Many people from both religions view the other with suspicion (at best) or fear and hatred (at worst).
footer.footerright: This suspicion existed from day one, and centuries of violence have only served to heighten it. Tragically, the border between Christianity and Islam has all too often been a bloody one.
